text: Na bhuñjamāno sabbahatthaṃ mukhe pakkhipissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā
edit: Na bhuñjamāno sabbahatthaṃ mukhe pakkhipissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā

translations.transtext: 42. I will not insert the whole hand into the mouth while eating: a training to be observed.
๔๒. พึงทำศึกษาว่า “เราฉันอยู่ จักไม่สอดมือทั้งนั้นเข้าในปาก”
42. I shall not put all the fingers into the mouth when eating: this is a training to be done.
